Title: Where is the Horse and the Rider?
Text:
Elladan is at his camp of Thorenhad just north of the road following the North-western fork out of Rivendell.

Lord Elrond has asked you to lend your assistance to his sons Elladan and Elrohir, currently seeking the missing Nazgûl.
CompleteText: My father has sent you to aid us? It is good that you have come, for we have made an unsettling discovery. It seems likely within the wilderness of the Trollshaws.
